item.description:
Join us early for a carpool to the National Seashore for a tour of the Nauset marsh overlooking the vast Atlantic.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This is an AMC hike led by an AMC leader. AMC membership is not required. However, you may wish to find more info about the Appalachian Mountain Club.

(C3C)
Activity: Hiking, less than 5 miles, average terrain, moderate pace.

Status: OPEN Walk perimeter of vast historic marsh. From Rte 6 in Eastham, R on Gov. Prence Rd, R on Fort Hill Rd to 1st pkg lot on L. Meet at 9:45 sharp to carpool to Salt Pond Visit Ctr. 2 hrs Date(s): January 17, 2013 (Thu) Location: Massachusetts, Cape Cod,  MA Difficulty: C3C Offered By: Southeastern Massachusetts AMC.  Registration is not required for this activity.

Leader: Pat Sarantis 
508-430-9965 
(Email this contact person with any questions about the hike. They have nothing to do with our carpool or breakfast arrangements.)

You may wish to contact us if you have any questions about the carpool or breakfast.  Dogs are not allowed on AMC hikes.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet to carpool in the back of the lot, near the Bass outlet store. We will carpool to breakfast at about 8:30 at the Fairway Restaurant on Route 6 in North Eastham.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Eastham Nauset Marsh
